refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the amplitude equivalent (in 16-bit signed integer scale) of the full scale decibel (dB FS) value x.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the amplitude equivalent of the full scale decibel (dB FS) value x. The logarithmic full scale decibel values will be converted to linear 16-bit signed integer values from −32,768 to +32,767.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the ampdbfs opcode. It uses the file ampdbfs.csd.
Example of the ampdbfs opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like:
instr 1: iamp = 29204.511 instr 1: iamp = 18426.801 instr 1: iamp = 16422.904 instr 1: iamp = 3276.800
